charts.name: Intel 12th Gen and Arc A770m GPU Telemetry

queries.query:
from(bucket: "telegraf-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "exec")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Arc Compute Util" or r["_field"] == "Arc Decode1/Encode1 Util" or r["_field"] == "Arc Decode2/Encode2 Util" or r["_field"] == "iGPU Compute Util" or r["_field"] == "iGPU Decode1/Encode1 Util" or r["_field"] == "iGPU Decode2/Encode2 Util")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

spec.name: Intel 12th Gen. Core i7 and Arc A770m Telemetry
